quotes.author: Chuck Noland
quotes.body: Because tomorrow, the sun will rise. Who knows what the tide may bring.

quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quotes.body: A leader is a dealer in hope.

quotes.author: Ogden Nash
quotes.body: Middle age is when you're sitting at home on a Saturday night and the telephone rings and you hope it isn't for you.

quotes.author: Michelangelo
quotes.body: Many believe - and I believe - that I have been designated for this work by God. In spite of my old age, I do not want to give it up; I work out of love for God and I put all my hope in Him.

quotes.author: Maggie Smith
quotes.body: It seems to me there is a change in what audiences want to see. I can only hope that's correct, because there's an awful lot of people of my age around now and we outnumber the others.

quotes.author: Debra Winger
quotes.body: I hope to find the roles that are age appropriate but not yearning to be younger, or parenting ad nauseam.

quotes.author: George Foreman
quotes.body: I hope to have one more boxing match at the age of 55. Given that demographic at the age of 55 to 65, you've got to make a statement with your life. Otherwise, you are just existing.

quotes.author: Calvin Klein
quotes.body: When I get into bed at night, I hope I don't get into it alone!

quotes.author: Bobby Flay
quotes.body: My contribution I hope is to get people to eat full-flavored food. If I could come away with that alone, that would be a fantastic accomplishment. I'm also very proud of being a very American chef.

quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford
quotes.body: I would hope that understanding and reconciliation are not limited to the 19th hole alone.

quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan
quotes.body: I think sometimes all you need is to hear someone else say the same thing that you're going through to realize that you're not alone. I try to put some sense of hope into the songs, into whatever the situation is so that it's not just dirt, drudgery and a life of misery.

quotes.author: Keanu Reeves
quotes.body: I've been pleased to work with so many wonderful stars through the years. This has been an amazing journey. I hope it continues.

quotes.author: Amanda Seyfried
quotes.body: I mean, why am I considered an 'it girl?' Because I'm in a lot of movies right now or am on the covers of magazines? I just hope there is something solid behind that. Because here's the thing with 'it girl' status. It's great and amazing that anybody is saying that at all. But how long does that last?

quotes.author: Prince William
quotes.body: I hope I'm not a tourist attraction - I'm sure that they come here really because St. Andrews is just amazing, a beautiful place.

quotes.author: Marion Cotillard
quotes.body: It was an amazing adventure, it was my dream to be in an American musical... I really hope you are going to love what you are going to see.

quotes.author: David Blaine
quotes.body: I just believe that the feeling of wonder is amazing. I am pushing myself as far as I can humanly push myself... I can only hope for the best and expect the worse.

quotes.author: Jack Layton
quotes.body: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.

quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
quotes.body: The London games mark the 24th anniversary of my winning two golds and setting the world record in the heptathlon. Someone is going to want it records are made to be broken - it's only a matter of time. I hope mine will outlive me.

quotes.author: Yoshio Taniguchi
quotes.body: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea.

quotes.author: Daniel Burnham
quotes.body: Make big plans aim high in hope and work, remembering that a noble, logical diagram once recorded will not die.

quotes.author: Claude Debussy
quotes.body: Art is the most beautiful deception of all. And although people try to incorporate the everyday events of life in it, we must hope that it will remain a deception lest it become a utilitarian thing, sad as a factory.

quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick
quotes.body: The screen is a magic medium. It has such power that it can retain interest as it conveys emotions and moods that no other art form can hope to tackle.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.body: I hope the millions of people I've touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.

quotes.author: Jesse Jackson
quotes.body: Today's students can put dope in their veins or hope in their brains. If they can conceive it and believe it, they can achieve it. They must know it is not their aptitude but their attitude that will determine their altitude.

quotes.author: Kiefer Sutherland
quotes.body: There are a lot of movies I'd like to throw away. That's not to say that I went in with that attitude. Any film I ever started, I went in with all the hope and best intentions in the world, but some films just don't work.
